nodes.text: A model of security droid was utilized by the New Republic Correctional Corps which bore a resemblance to a R1-series astromech droid. At least two units of this droid were deployed to a New Republic Correctional Transport, the Bothan-Five where they were used to patrol the vessel until they were encountered by a crew of mercenaries attempting to rescue a Twi'lek prisoner named Qin. One of the mercenaries, a Devaronian named Burg, attacked the droids severely damaging one before throwing it into the other, causing an explosion which destroyed both units.
